website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive fan that delivers a modern style with the ease of remote control.
pros: Fan has dimmable LED lights and a fast speed
Good quality for a lower price
cons: Fan blades are made of plastic

customer_reviews.title: Bad remote control design renders the fan inoperable
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd fan in less than a year. The remote control receiver in the fan stops working requiring a replacement. The fan will not work without the receiver. The receiver is available for $50-65, but ours only lasted an average of 3-4 months. We bought this fan for $44 "refurbished" solely for the receiver unit. I will trash the fan and buy a different brand if the receiver fails again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if they gave you the option of setting the ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit noisier than expected and you can't have a separate switch for fan and light it's all controlled through one switch and then the remote control. It would be nice if they gave you the option of setting the speed and brightness with remote and then using two switches one for the fan one for the light.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Hearne

customer_reviews.title: Great Product; Pricier than same Product at Brick and Mortar appliance store
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product! Functions well. This is my 3rd purchase of same product. Moves lots of air. The price is higher than exact same product that can be found in appliance stores. I was so excited about purchasing this product, I discovered the price difference after the fact.
customer_reviews.author: Analytical Clock

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. However had an issue with the included remote
customer_reviews.text: Installed fan. Looks great. However had an issue with the included remote. The receiver was not syncing with transmitter. Had to call customer service to ask for a new temote. Currently hard wired to run without remote but it run only on high speed. Also, when installed in a small room 10×10, the fan was not able to circulate the air properly. Reinstalled in a larger roon and it perfirmed better at moving air.
customer_reviews.author: Liem Higa

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this fan. We actually left it in the apartment we moved out of. I installed Myself (with zero experience) and the remote control is a nice added feature. Often opened the windows and turned it on in the spring. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cortland L Lee

customer_reviews.title: This fan is amazing. My contractor said this is the best fan ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan is amazing. My contractor said this is the best fan he has seen and he has been installing several recently. Highly recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best fan for our family's needs
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best fan for our family's needs. Provides an LED light which can be dimmed to your own liking, we can feel the air breeze by us all the way across the kitchen from the dining room. WE love it!!! Bought another one as we liked it so much, looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent air movement in my bedroom with very little noise
customer_reviews.author: Coleston

customer_reviews.title: Great Both Times
customer_reviews.text: I've put this exact fan in both garages I've owned. Really easy to install. Looks great in the sort of aviation/helicopter theme. The light kind is more of a spotlight directly below the fan, but this is nice if you have a workbench under the fan. If I ever own another garage, it will go in that one too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Nice long contemporary design !
customer_reviews.text: It was great! The blades are in the darker side but other than that! Fabulous !
customer_reviews.author: Adesigner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look,style & function of this fan... Love the remote, led dimmable light & nice airflow & quiet...
customer_reviews.author: reginaking2

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy for a bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I had to return. It was too noisy for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Cabrillo317

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design making it very hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Horrible design making it very hard to install! Especially if your putting in a older home. Way to many wires that you need to fit inside and hide in small celling plate, remote box should be built into fan not an added box that you must try and fit into the mounting plate. I would not recommend this fan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light will quit working in a year.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan from Home Depot, in less than a year the light went out. Paid $99 for the fan and the replacement for the light cost $40 almost half the cost of the fan, I would not recommend this to anyone. the fan works really well that's what the second star is for, if you buy this fan just be ready in a year to buy another light for it.
customer_reviews.author: Garfeild

customer_reviews.title: Worst 4 hours of my life.....
customer_reviews.text: What a joke....rather than simply putting all screws and parts into a bag, they completely assemble the fan. You then have to figure out what to take apart and reuse what screws. I'm sure this is a cost saving issue on their end......but will take you a hell of a lot longer to install. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Marian Madden

customer_reviews.title: went bad after a couple months of use
customer_reviews.text: Get three of this fans at HD. Two are very loud, with a strange sound. One, the speed controller on the fan, went bad after a couple months of use. Bad product. You can find a better product for that money.
customer_reviews.author: carlos a franco

product_meta.title: Home Decorators Collection Merwry 52" Indoor Brushed Nickel Fan
product_meta.description: Impart a sleek, modern look into your room with the 52 in. Merwry Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan from Home Decorators Collection. The five ABS fan blades attach to the top of the motor housing, projecting a unique profile and a sophisticated appearance. A 17-Watt fully dimmable LED light is encased into the hub, with a frosted opal twist-on glass cover that integrates seamlessly for a clean aesthetic. The reversible, 3-speed motor and LED light are controlled via handheld remote control for ultimate convenience.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars32 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
